title: Marcel Pagnol | Yacout (1934 film) Nagib El-Rihani, Aimée Provence, Badi Khayri | French-Arabic

sources.title: Marcel Pagnol | Yacout (1934 film) Nagib El-Rihani, Aimée Provence, Badi Khayri | French-Arabic
sources.description:
Egyptian version of a popular play by French writer Pagnol. A timid and naive schoolteacher is taken advantage of. A wealthy aristocrat uses him in a money making scheme and the teacher now seems to enjoy the new corruption.

Original title: Yacout (1934)


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/dKcyIiaKGNk

Directors: Nagib El-Rihani, Willy Rozier
Writers: Marcel Pagnol, Nagib El-Rihani, Badi Khayri
Stars: Nagib El-Rihani, Aimée Provence, Badi Khayri
Genres: Colorized, Literary, Comedy, Drama
Languages: Arabic - French
